Plot Time Series of Multiple SMC Scenarios

Source: R/model_visualizations.R
plot_scenario_time_series.Rd

Creates a time series plot comparing multiple SMC deployment scenarios, with optional shaded rectangles for SMC timing and credible intervals.

Usage

plot_scenario_time_series(
  summary_df,
  scenarios_to_plot = NULL,
  title = "SMC Scenario Time Series",
  facet = TRUE,
  ncol = NULL,
  save = TRUE,
  out_dir = NULL,
  filename = "ts_scenario_comparison",
  width = 12,
  height = 6,
  smc_patterns = NULL,
  smc_day_of_month = 15,
  month_cov = NULL,
  years = NULL,
  x_lab = "",
  y_lab = "Weekly Cases"
)

Arguments

summary_df

Data frame containing columns: date_ymd, variable, median, lower, upper, scenario.

scenarios_to_plot

Optional vector of scenario names to include.

title

Plot title.

facet

Whether to facet by scenario.

save

Logical. If TRUE, saves plot to out_dir.

out_dir

Directory to save the plot.

filename

Base filename to save (without extension).

width

Plot width (in inches).

height

Plot height (in inches).

smc_patterns

Optional named list of month vectors (length 12) with 1/0 indicating SMC months.

smc_day_of_month

Day of month to anchor rectangles (default 15).

month_cov

Optional named numeric vector giving relative coverage for each month (1–12).

years

Vector of years for which to generate rectangles.

Value

A ggplot object.
